00020 /*
00021  * IntegralImage.h
00022  *
00023  *  Created on: Nov 16, 2011
00024  *      Author: Georg Nebehay
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifndef INTEGRALIMAGE_H_
00028 #define INTEGRALIMAGE_H_
00029 
00030 #include <cv.h>
00031 
00032 namespace tld
00033 {
00034 
00035 template <class T>
00036 class IntegralImage
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     T *data;  /* Array containg the entries for the integral image in row-first manner. Of size width*height. Allocated by tldAllocIntImg */
00040     /* width, height: Dimensions of integral image.*/
00041     int width;
00042     int height;
00043 
00044     IntegralImage(cv::Size size)
00045     {
00046         data = new T[size.width * size.height];
00047     }
00048 
00049     virtual ~IntegralImage()
00050     {
00051         delete[] data;
00052     }
00053 
00054     const void calcIntImg(const cv::Mat &img, bool squared = false)
00055     {
00056         const unsigned char *input = (const unsigned char *)(img.data);
00057         T *output = data;
00058 
00059         for(int i = 0; i < img.cols; i++)
00060         {
00061             for(int j = 0; j < img.rows; j++)
00062             {
00063                 T A = (i > 0) ? output[img.cols * j + i - 1] : 0;
00064                 T B = (j > 0) ? output[img.cols * (j - 1) + i] : 0;
00065                 T C = (j > 0 && i > 0) ? output[img.cols * (j - 1) + i - 1] : 0;
00066                 T value = input[img.step * j + i];
00067 
00068                 if(squared)
00069                 {
00070                     value = value * value;
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 output[img.cols * j + i] = A + B - C + value;
00074             }
00075         }
00076 
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 } /* namespace tld */
00082 #endif /* INTEGRALIMAGE_H_ */
